short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a bug reporting extension that allows users to report bugs on websites and send them to Jira with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of finding bugs in one place and then navigate to Jira to create a ticket, go back take a screenshot and stuff ? Well with this extension you have everything under one click. Follow the one time configuration settings and you should be good to go.
